p: To model the transmission dynamics of ZIKV infections and estimate relevant epidemiological parameters, we fitted an ento-epidemiological, climate-driven transmission model to ZIKV incidence and climate data of FSA between 2015 and 2017 within a Bayesian framework, similar to our previous work on a dengue outbreak in the Island of Madeira ( Louren√ßo and Recker, 2014).
